author: amolagg
title: AI in geological analysis
description: 目前的地质分析技术具有侵入性，而且非常昂贵。

f6_assessments.q0: 这个问题由于其特定的性质（双关语），确实很难放到除杂项之外的任何其他挑战中。其核心思想旨在使用深度学习算法来扩展做非侵入性地理分析的方法。如果能在提案中加入一些信息，说明这与Cardano生态系统有什么直接关系，以及提案的目的是如何整合到/使用Cardano，将对提案大有裨益。该提案的解释非常简单，需要更多关于实际产品和过程的信息，以便被理解和评估。所提到的这两个关键点将增加项目的可理解性，并加强问题陈述。根据我作为几个基金的社区顾问的经验，在起草提案时，与Cardano有一个明确的联系，同时有一个明确的问题陈述，并有一个可理解的和详细的解决方案，这是关键。目前，由于缺乏信息，很难理解项目的范围（时间表，里程碑，成本等，但是），但我们稍后会讨论这个问题。基于以上提到的这些方面，我坚决不同意这个提案能有效地解决这个难题。
f6_assessments.q1: 该提案可以使用更多关于发展过程的信息，同时描述如何开发和使用地质分析技术，以及它们与目前使用的技术相比有什么影响。我绝不是地质学家，但我有相当多的研究工作经验，我建议在提案中增加更多的细节，以便使它更容易理解和具体化。既要为具有地质学领域专业知识的人服务，也要为没有专业知识的人服务。如果能介绍一下将从事这个项目的核心团队/提案人，也会有好处。这个团队有多少年的地质学经验，它是否由几个成员组成，地质分析的原型（在 "相关经验 "下提到的）现在是否在使用？我们在哪里可以了解到更多的信息？该产品是否旨在与学术界一起使用？更重要的是，在回答了所有这些问题之后，我建议提供一个可核实的来源，以进一步加强团队成员的能力和经验。也许通过LinkedIn-profiles、合作大学等。最后，我希望能看到包括一个更详细的预算计划。将有多少钱用于开发、材料等。还有，从开始到结束估计有多少工作时间（也许每周）？总而言之，由于缺乏必要的信息，我坚决不同意这个提案有可能被成功实施。
f6_assessments.q2: 如前所述，如果能有一个包含里程碑的路线图，在估计的时间框架内，这个提案将受益匪浅。这样就能以一种透明的方式对其进行审计，而社区也能在发展过程中跟踪其进展（最好是通过媒体渠道或项目网站）。一些需要回答的关键问题的建议。开发最初的原型需要多少个月/年？将如何测试，由谁测试？测试阶段将有多长时间，如何衡量成功（关键绩效指标）？另外，如果在开发过程中出现意外情况，会发生什么？团队旨在如何应对过程中的潜在挑战？在提案中加入团队对这些问题的反思的简短文字，将加强团队的可信度和观点，如果这些反思与社区分享，将加强整个项目的整体信任和透明度。由于刚才描述的原因，我坚决不同意这个提案在评估实现其既定目标的进展方面为我提供了足够的信息。

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal is to sponsor research for a noninvasive Geological survey using AI. The proposal will contribute to Geology however its benefit for Cardano looks remote and may not address the challenge except to create goodwill in the Scientist community.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer has one year of experience as a Deep Learning Engineer and had been an Interned at Google. This may not be sufficient for the proposed Research. High-end reserch will require academic guidance from a Univercity.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal is to fund Research project for an AI-based Geological survey. There is no major plan presented and who will validate the research.

f6_assessments.q0:
I think I am competent to assess this proposal as I have been voting since Fund 4 and have experience analyzing business requirements from 7 years of delivering software as a QA engineer.
Though the problem statement is clear, it does not seem to me like it pertains to Cardano. The solution, while it does address the problem statement, is too vague in my opinion and again it is unclear what the role of Cardano, or blockchain for that matter, would play here. A good proposal should always outline this, in order for non-technical voters to understand why it would be valuable to fund it. Due to this and the lack of any type of KPI or concrete goal, I have to strongly disagree that this proposal effectively addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer claims to have 1 year of experience as a Deep Learning Enginner and to have interned at Google, but no references are provided to prove this. Please keep in mind that it is pretty much expected of all proposals now to provide at least a Linkedin profile, or something similar, where the community can see your relevant experience and background.
I strongly disagree that this proposal can be implemented successfully, due to the lack of information on the team who would work on this, no details on how the budget would be used, no risk analysis and no plan outlining the technical approach and the usage of resources concretely. Please keep in mind that these are all vital parts of a proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: Unfortunately, no roadmap is provided, there are no KPI's and it is basically unclear what this proposal aims to do to better the Cardano ecosystem, so I strongly disagree that this proposal is auditable.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is about building a Non-Invasive Geological analysis system, highly efficient and accurate through Deep Learning Algorithms. It seems that this proposal is incomplete. The problem statement [current Geological Analysis techniques are invasive in nature and very expansion] is clear but not explained in detail. Conceptually, I think the proposed solution has a certain fit for the challenge. The solution is oriented towards building such a platform having satisfactory and has potential impact if completed. Based on the given information, I strongly disagree with this proposal's impact, and would give it a score of 1.
f6_assessments.q1: It's not easy to evaluate a proposal that is incomplete [limited information of experience, doesn't have any roadmap or KPIs, and of course the risk is not defined]. Therefore, definitely, there are no grounds to agree on the feasibility of this proposal, however, if I had to give one piece of advice, I think: in case it is necessary to complete this proposal in the next Catalysts in the future, the proposer should pay attention to ensure that the following components are fully met: (i) Goals & target; (2) road map/timeline (integrated with measurable KPIs/metrics); (3) Budget breakdown; (4) Risk and challenge. Based on the given information, I strongly disagree with this proposal's feasible, and would give it a score of 1.
f6_assessments.q2: For an incomplete proposal like this one, transparency can't be guaranteed. Therefore, I don't have much advice. Based on the given information, I strongly disagree with this proposal's auditability, and would give it a score of 1.

f6_assessments.q0: Thank you for your interest in natural matters. besides i would like to know the real problem you bring up is that we are going to have explicit concrete method in Geology. Do you want a method to protect nature or a clear method to exploit more effectively? When the problem is clear I think we can understand the effective method that AI will bring
f6_assessments.q1: In terms of feasibility, I hope you can elaborate more on your personal profile as well as your team such as whether there is someone responsible for the financial or blockchain aspect. Also I hope you can show us the short and long term project roadmap. And the criteria you need to achieve in the future, I think it is necessary for your project. The nature of this project requires state permission as well as a high level of expertise in geology. Currently, many countries can already use AI for jobs ranging from geological measurement and analysis to real estate. This project will be more feasible if you have specific plans and clear roadmap. From there we can build from high community demand.
f6_assessments.q2:
In the roadmap I hope you can describe what value you want here, 
vì số tiền bạn chi cho AI là rất tốn kém. you require an investment of up to 8000$ which is quite a large amount.You should explain how you will use this money? For how long and how can people see you using it?

solution: 通过深度学习算法，我们可以建立非侵入性的地质分析系统，高效而准确。
experience:
因开发地质系统的原型而获得资助。
深度学习工程师- 1年
曾在谷歌实习。
